job_title: System & Hardware Validation and DVT Engineer
job_description:
• Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to define validation criteria, corner cases, and coverage for system qualification.
• Drive system bring-up, debug, and qualification from EVT → DVT → PVT phases.
• Experience in system-level hardware validation and DVT for high-performance computing or datacenter platforms.
• Proven experience with HASS methodologies and environmental stress testing.
• Hands-on experience with precision clock distribution validation, jitter analysis, and signal integrity verification.
• Strong analytical, troubleshooting, and cross-disciplinary collaboration skills.
• Knowledge of factory qualification processes, including ICT, functional test, and burn-in.
• Background in firmware/software integration testing for large-scale systems.
